title: Update Services section to match provided 4-card layout and styling

requirements.text: Update the landing page Services section component (frontend/src/components/landing/ServicesSection.tsx) to match the provided 4-card grid layout and styling: white section background, centered underlined section heading, and four cards using a light-blue background, rounded corners, bottom border accent, and shadow.

quotes:
...

અમારી સ્પેશિયલ એસી સર્વિસ

...
...

acceptanceCriteria: Services section background is white and uses similar vertical spacing to the provided snippet.
Section heading is centered, underlined, and uses an English heading (not Gujarati) while preserving the same visual emphasis (underline + offset).
Cards render in a responsive 1/2/4-column grid with consistent spacing.
Each card uses: padding, light-blue background, rounded-2xl corners, a bottom border accent (border-b-4), and a visible shadow.

requirements.text: Ensure the Services section uses English user-facing text while preserving the service titles and translating the Gujarati descriptions into English for the four services: Jet Wash Service, Expert Repairing, Gas Refilling, and Installation.

quotes: Use English for any user-facing text in the build request.
ઇન્ડોર અને આઉટડોર ડીપ ક્લીનિંગ.
PCB અને કમ્પ્રેસરનું ચોકસાઈપૂર્વક કામ.
ઓરીજીનલ ગેસ દ્વારા ફૂલ કુલિંગની ખાતરી.
નવા અને જૂના એસીનું સુરક્ષિત ફિટિંગ.

acceptanceCriteria: No Gujarati text is displayed in the Services section after the update.
The four service titles appear exactly as: Jet Wash Service, Expert Repairing, Gas Refilling, Installation.

Each card contains an English description corresponding to the original Gujarati sentence meaning (deep cleaning indoor/outdoor; precise PCB/compressor work; original gas for full cooling; safe fitting for new/old AC).

requirements.text: Replace the icon implementation in the Services section to avoid Font Awesome dependency while still showing the four intended icons (snowflake, tools, gas pump, box/open package) with similar size and blue color as the provided snippet.
acceptanceCriteria: Each of the four service cards shows an icon above the title with approximately the same visual prominence as text-4xl.
Icons are blue and aligned/centered consistently across cards.
No new Font Awesome stylesheet/script dependency is introduced.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn/ui sources are read-only).
Do not edit any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths from SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this UI update.
nonGoals: Do not add new booking flows, new sections, or additional services beyond the four provided.
Do not introduce third-party authentication providers or external databases.
Do not change the Hero section or WhatsApp/call CTAs as part of this request.
